page:
OBJECT.GETACTIVEOBJPARENT Function> The <OBJECT>.GETACTIVEOBJPARENT()returns a pointer to the container of the object that has focus.
Container_Object as P = .GetActiveObjParent()
The <OBJECT>.GETACTIVEOBJPARENT() method applies to:
Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)
Desktop applications only.
Form Functions and Methods Browse Functions and Methods
